resources.string: 1. There is no job guarantee after completion of course.
2. Completion certificate will be issued to me only if, I clear the exam conducted by the company at the end of training.
3. Fee paid is not refundable in any case.
4. All above written information about me is true.

If i fail to deposit fees on/before due date, I will have to pay Rs.100/- per day(as late fees charges) along with due fees and i will have to re-enroll for the course joined if i fail to deposit my fees installment eve after 10th day of due date.
